## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing a boiler
- Ensure there is enough space and a suitable position for placing the boiler. Manually check the area for any obstructions before attempting to place the boiler.

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Verify that the path between entities is clear and that there are no obstructions that could prevent pipe connections. Ensure that the entities are within a connectable range and that the correct type of pipe is being used.

### Errors when refueling entities
- Make sure to place the fuel (e.g., coal) into an entity that can accept it. Verify that you are close enough to the target entity and that it is capable of accepting the fuel type you are trying to insert.
